verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Lift up your heart, lift up your voice; newline Rejoice; again I say, rejoice.

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: We soon shall hear the archangel's voice; newline The trump of God shall sound, rejoice!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Rejoice, the Lord is King! newline Your Lord and King adore; newline Mortals, give thanks and sing, newline And triumph evermore.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Jesus the Savior reigns, newline The God of truth and love; newline When He had purged our stains, newline He took His seat above.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: His kingdom cannot fail; newline He rules o'er earth and heaven; newline The keys of earth and hell newline Are to our Jesus given.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Rejoice in glorious hope! newline Jesus the Judge shall come newline And take His servants up newline To their eternal home.
